description:
Tiny native Discord app

Dissent (previously gtkcord4) is a third-party Discord client designed for a smooth, native experience on Linux desktops.
Built with the GTK4 and libadwaita for a modern look and feel, it delivers your favorite Discord app in a lightweight and visually appealing package.
Updated Arikawa to v3.6.0. This comes with a few bug fixes, namely #361.
v0.0.36 was originally created for this, but it didn't contain the generated Go changes. This version fixes that.
Full Changelog: https://github.com/diamondburned/dissent/compare/v0.0.35...v0.0.37
